title: Being relatively new residents to the area, less than 2 months; we are wondering if there are any \' day old \' bakeries in Wilmington ? As in where bakery items nearing their shelf life, are discounted ? If so, where ?  Thanks.
text:
I wasn't sure if you got this earlier, so I'm sending it again.

Here's a link to the answer to your question.
